page.title: 14Children's Games
page.content: Our class's favourite{Playground Game} is called{'Buzz Off'.}We often play{ {Buzz Off'} because it is easy and good fun to play.{Buzz Off}is a game played with {3 }or more players.Someone is given the job of{catcher}or{'it'}.The game is played in an area which has {steps}and you run from one set of steps to another.If someone comes to your steps and tells you to 'buzz off' then you must leave those steps and find another set.When you get to another set of steps you must say 'Buzz off' and whoever is on the steps must leave. The{catcher's}job is to catch people as they run from one set of steps to another.If you get caught then you become the{catcher}.By the way it is important that there are more people than steps so that there are always people on the move.
